pages.text: If there's no conflict in crafting, I will never made new materials.

pages.title: Handle
pages.text: End part of swords for user to grab.

pages.title: Rod
pages.text: A long wood stick that can be uesd to make long weapons and can also be used in combat.

pages.title: Lamellar Armor Piece
pages.text: Flexible armor material made with tiny square armor pieces. Can be used in making lamellar armors.

pages.title: Chain Armor Piece
pages.text: Soft armor material made with tiny rings. Can be used in making chain armors.
